text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preis zu haben, als:
  1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Cœna Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Eremplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leuchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> † <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes, gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms</TITLE> <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"1) Corrected malformed closing tag </PRICE> to </PRIZE> in the last BIBL entry so that opening and closing tags match.
2) Ensured that all <PRIZE> elements are properly closed and nested inside their respective <BIBL> elements.
3) Preserved the overall structure by keeping each numbered item within a <BIBL> block, without introducing new structural tags that are not evidenced in the source.
4) Normalized some obviously broken Unicode sequences (e.g. replacing garbled characters with their likely intended forms such as Bücher, Preis, Cœna, Leuchter, Erklärung, über, gründlich) where this does not affect XML structure but improves readability.
5) Added whitespace and line breaks to make the XML more readable while keeping it structurally equivalent to the original, apart from the tag fix and minor text normalizations."}

Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> † <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL>
  6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes, gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. </ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Corrected malformed closing tag </PRICE> to </PRIZE> in the last BIBL entry so that opening and closing tags match.
2) Ensured that all <PRIZE> elements are properly closed and nested inside their respective <BIBL> elements.
3) Preserved the overall structure by keeping each numbered item within a <BIBL> block, without introducing new structural tags that are not evidenced in the source.
4) Normalized some obviously broken Unicode sequences (e.g. replacing garbled characters with their likely intended forms such as Bücher, Preis, Cœna, Leuchter, Erklärung, über, gründlich) where this does not affect XML structure but improves readability.
5) Added whitespace and line breaks to make the XML more readable while keeping it structurally equivalent to the original, apart from the tag fix and minor text normalizations.
